duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver subject matter expertise in Fire Protection Engineering for DoD federal government, Military, and Intelligence Community partners.
Participate in the creation of design analyses, conceptual designs, program requirements, calculations, equipment selection, and layout for fire protection and alarm systems.
Collaborate in a design team environment and interface with mission partners, clients, and Authorities Having Jurisdiction (AHJ) to prepare, validate, and deliver key design efforts.
Receive mentorship from Mid-Level and Senior Professionals to grow and expand a career in Fire Protection Engineering.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Fire Protection Engineering (ABET accredited)
Engineer-in-training (EIT) or NICET Level 3 and above
